title: Sticker Encyclopedia: Space
description: With more than 600 reusable stickers to keep little hands busy for hours, Sticker Encyclopedia: Space features stickers and facts about everything space-related, from lunar modules, to the planets of our Solar System, to galaxies millions of light-years away.

title: Curious George: 75th Anniversary Edition
description: This treasured classic is where it all began for the curious, loveable monkey. Special anniversary cover with foil and spot gloss make this edition a must-have for any children’s book collection. Includes bonus downloadable audio read by the actor, producer, and director John Krasinski. Access code can be found inside the book on page 2.

title: The Amazonian Indians? (What Do We Know About)
description: Explores what we know about the Amazonian Indians. Illustrated throughout in colour, a new title in the WHAT DO WE KNOW ABOUT series. Meets the requirements of the National Curriculum Key Stage 2/3.

title: Tales of Mystery & Imagination (Library of Fantasy and Adventure Series)
description: In Tales of Mystery and Imagination, Tony Al lan retells some of the classic tales of master horror write r Edgar Allan Poe. Included in the collection are Masque of the Red Death, The Pit and the Pendulum, Gold Bug, and The F all of the House of Usher '

title: Frida Kahlo (My Early Library: My Itty-Bitty Bio)
description: The My Itty-Bitty Bio series are biographies for the earliest readers. This book examines the life of Frida Kahlo in a simple, age-appropriate way that will help children develop word recognition and reading skills. Includes a timeline and other informative backmatter.
